body_html: I think external type-stubs for TensorFlow would make sense, along the lines of what we've started doing for numpy with numpy-stubs. This would allow for integrating tensorflow with mypy (which is currently not supported).
body_text: I think external type-stubs for TensorFlow would make sense, along the lines of what we've started doing for numpy with numpy-stubs. This would allow for integrating tensorflow with mypy (which is currently not supported).
body: I think external type-stubs for TensorFlow would make sense, along the lines of what we've started doing for numpy with [numpy-stubs](https://github.com/numpy/numpy-stubs). This would allow for integrating tensorflow with mypy (which is currently not supported).
